scenes.text:
We are a friendly and relaxed group always excited to welcome new members! Whatever your ability, experience, style or interest, there will be something for you at Cardiff University Art Society!

Each session will be unique and explore a variety of different mediums, styles and themes, to allow members to learn and experience new things!

We always strive to create a welcoming atmosphere where people can have a laugh and engage with creativity!
We usually meet weekly, but specific date and times for socials can be found on our SU page and our Instagram.

Our membership is Â£3.00 for the year! 

We do plan to organise affordable trips to various locations, and we can provide special art packs available to buy, with every art medium you may need!

Our weekly sessions will vary from life-drawing, to Bob Ross paint-a-longs, group projects and themed art, eg. artist-based, time-themed

We plan to organise affordable trips to various locations eg. museums, galleries and exhibitions, including outdoor settings for some classes.
